---
category: news
title: "Nicaragua switches diplomatic recognition to Beijing from Taiwan"
excerpt: "NICARAGUA will switch its diplomatic recognition to China from Taiwan, it announced on Thursday. Taiwan — officially the Republic of China — is a Chinese island province that has governed itself since it became the last holdout of the Nationalist Chiang Kai-shek government following China’s 1949 communist revolution."
